News.headline: Dagenham & Redbridge Christmas Carol Concert 2016
News.short_description: The Daggers will be hoding a Christmas Carol Concert on Saturday 17th December
News.description:
The Silent night Carol Concert at Dagenham and Redbridge FC will start at 5:30pm - 6:15pm on Saturday 17th December after our Vanarama National League game against Solihull Moors.

The Concert will be held in our Traditional Builders Stand, with music provided by the Pavilion Brass Band.

With free entry everyone is welcome so we hope to see as many of you there as possible.
